DOC.brief_title: Fexofenadine Study On Filipino Children The Relief Perennial And Intermittent Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Children manifest allergic rhinitis symptom sneeze , rhinorrhea , itchy nose/palate/throat and/or itchy/watery/red eye .
